where.label: wr1
where.expression: EXISTS(internal_location) OR EXISTS(street_number) OR EXISTS(street) OR EXISTS(postal_box) OR EXISTS(town) OR EXISTS(region) OR EXISTS(postal_code) OR EXISTS(country) OR EXISTS(facsimile_number) OR EXISTS(telephone_number) OR EXISTS(electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS(telex_number)

where.label: wr1
where.expression:
(SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.length_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.mass_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.time_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.electric_current_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.thermodynamic_temperature_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.amount_of_substance_exponent = 1.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.luminous_intensity_exponent = 0.000000)

where.label: wr1
where.expression:
(SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.length_exponent = 2.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.mass_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.time_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.electric_current_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.thermodynamic_temperature_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.amount_of_substance_exponent = 0.000000) AND (SELF
amed_unit.dimensions.luminous_intensity_exponent = 0.000000)

where.label: wr4
where.expression: NOT EXISTS(axis) OR NOT EXISTS(ref_direction) OR (cross_product(axis, ref_direction).magnitude > 0.000000)

entity.name: b_spline_curve
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(uniform_curve, b_spline_curve_with_knots, quasi_uniform_curve, bezier_curve) ANDOR rational_b_spline_curve

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.QUASI_UNIFORM_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.BEZIER_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_CURVE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF))

entity.name: b_spline_surface
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(b_spline_surface_with_knots, uniform_surface, quasi_uniform_surface, bezier_surface) ANDOR rational_b_spline_surface

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.QUASI_UNIFORM_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.BEZIER_SURFACE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_SURFACE_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF))

entity.name: b_spline_volume
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(b_spline_volume_with_knots, uniform_volume, quasi_uniform_volume, bezier_volume) ANDOR rational_b_spline_volume

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.BEZIER_VOLUME' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.UNIFORM_VOLUME' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.QUASI_UNIFORM_VOLUME' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.B_SPLINE_VOLUME_WITH_KNOTS' IN TYPEOF(SELF))

entity.name: bounded_curve
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(polyline, b_spline_curve, trimmed_curve, bounded_pcurve, bounded_surface_curve, composite_curve)

where.label: wr4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(elp_fbnds <* QUERY(bnds <* extent.bounds | 'AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF(bnds.bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list | NOT (('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.EDGE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(oe.edge_element)) AND (oe.edge_element\geometric_representation_item.dim = 2)))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: wr1
where.expression: NOT closed_curve AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* segments | temp.transition = discontinuous)) = 1) OR closed_curve AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* segments | temp.transition = discontinuous)) = 0)

where.label: wr8
where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[2], points[3]], [points[5], points[6], points[7], points[8]])

where.label: wr9
where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[4], points[8]], [points[3], points[7], points[6], points[2]])

where.label: wr10
where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[2], points[5]], [points[3], points[7], points[8], points[4]])

where.label: wr11
where.expression: same_side([points[5], points[6], points[7]], [points[1], points[2], points[3], points[4]])

where.label: wr12
where.expression: same_side([points[3], points[7], points[6]], [points[1], points[4], points[8], points[5]])

where.label: wr13
where.expression: same_side([points[3], points[7], points[8]], [points[1], points[5], points[6], points[2]])

entity.name: curve
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(line, conic, clothoid, circular_involute, pcurve, surface_curve, offset_curve_2d, offset_curve_3d, curve_replica)

where.label: wr1
where.expression: NOT implicit_outer OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* boundaries | 'AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.OUTER_BOUNDARY_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(temp))) = 0)

where.label: wr2
where.expression: NOT ('AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.PRODUCT' IN TYPEOF(SELF\document_product_association.related_product)) OR (SELF\document_product_association.relating_document.kind.product_data_type = 'configuration controlled document') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(SELF\document_product_association.related_product, 'AP239_PRODUCT_LIFE_CYCLE_SUPPORT_MIM_LF.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name = 'document')) = 1)

where.label: wr3

where.label: wr4
